title: expiration date for shared links is not correctly set under certain conditions
body:
### expected behaviour
expiration date is set and shown correctly

### actual behaviour
expiration date is not set

### steps to reproduce
1. under any file or directory, click the "share" action to open the dropdown
2. click in the "share with link" checkbox
3. click in the "set expiration date" checkbox and set a valid date
4. click again in the "share with link" checkbox to uncheck it
5. click again in the "share with link" checkbox to check it again
6. the dropdown shows the expiration checkbox checked and a valid date set
7. click outside the dropdown to close it
8. click in the "share" action of the same file.
9. the "share with link" checkbox is checked, but the expiration is not

there is a mismatch between what is shown in point 6 and what is the real data we have in point 9.

### server configuration
owncloud version: 5.0.9 and 5.0.11rc2

### client configuration
browser: firefox, chrome (it's possible that it happens with more browsers)
